ch.intertec.storybook.util

Enum Constants.LookAndFeel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Constants.LookAndFeel>
      • ch.intertec.storybook.util.Constants.LookAndFeel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Constants.LookAndFeel>
    Enclosing class:
    Constants

    public static enum Constants.LookAndFeel
extends java.lang.Enum<Constants.LookAndFeel>
    Preference values used for look and feel settings. Some Look and Feels are not a hundred percent supported. Only System and Cross Platform has to be supported fully.
    See Also:
    Constants.Preference.LAF

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      cross
      Cross Platform Look and Feel
      motif
      Motif Look and Feel, not recommended to use
      nimbus
      Nimbus LAF
      substance
      Substance Look and Feel, see Substance Homepage.
      system
      System Look and Feel
      tiny
      Tiny Look and Feel, see Tiny LaF Homepage.
      tonic
      Tonic Look and Feel, see Tonic Homepage.
